titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit high-deductible health plans to provide chronic disease prevention services to plan enrollees prior to satisfying their plan deductible.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Chronic Disease Management Act of 2019
This bill allows high deductible health plans to provide treatment for chronic diseases without requiring a plan deductible.
